targets.expr: aws_alb_request_count_sum{source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", dimension_AvailabilityZone="", dimension_TargetGroup=""} + on (name)  group_left(tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack) topk(1,aws_alb_info{tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack!~".*kube-system.*|.*monitoring.*|.*book-info.*|.*logging.*",tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack=~".*subscription.*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}) by(name,tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack)

aws_alb_target_response_time_average{source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", dimension_AvailabilityZone="", dimension_TargetGroup=""} + on (name)  group_left(tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack) topk(1,aws_alb_info{tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack!~".*kube-system.*|.*monitoring.*|.*book-info.*|.*logging.*",tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack=~".*subscription.*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}) by(name,tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack)

aws_alb_httpcode_target_4_xx_count_sum{source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", dimension_AvailabilityZone="", dimension_TargetGroup=""} + on (name)  group_left(tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack) topk(1,aws_alb_info{tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack!~".*kube-system.*|.*monitoring.*|.*book-info.*|.*logging.*",tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack=~".*subscription.*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}) by(name,tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack)

aws_alb_httpcode_target_5_xx_count_sum{source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", dimension_AvailabilityZone="", dimension_TargetGroup=""} + on (name)  group_left(tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack) topk(1,aws_alb_info{tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack!~".*kube-system.*|.*monitoring.*|.*book-info.*|.*logging.*",tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack=~".*subscription.*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}) by(name,tag_ingress_k8s_aws_stack)

targets.expr:
avg(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", pod=~"$service-[0-9a-z]*-[0-9a-z]*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) /
sum(container_spec_cpu_quota{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", pod=~"$service-[0-9a-z]*-[0-9a-z]*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}/container_spec_cpu_period{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", pod=~"$service-[0-9a-z]*-[0-9a-z]*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}) by (pod))

max(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", pod=~"$service-[0-9a-z]*-[0-9a-z]*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) /
sum(container_spec_cpu_quota{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", pod=~"$service-[0-9a-z]*-[0-9a-z]*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}/container_spec_cpu_period{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", pod=~"$service-[0-9a-z]*-[0-9a-z]*", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster"}) by (pod))

targets.query: SELECT sum(lag) as total_lag FROM (SELECT last("lag") as lag FROM burrow.autogen.burrow_partition WHERE "group" =~ /^prod.hspay.*.subscription./ GROUP BY time($__interval), "group",topic,partition fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),"group", topic

SELECT sum(lag) as total_lag FROM (SELECT last("lag") as lag FROM burrow.autogen.burrow_partition WHERE "group" =~ /^prod.hspay.*.subscription./ GROUP BY time($__interval), "group",topic,partition fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),"group", topic

targets.expr: (avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"subs-notify-consumer.*", namespace="hspay", container!="POD", image!="", source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod)) * 100)

(avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"hs-partner-su.*", namespace="hspay", container!="POD", image!="", source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod)) * 100)

(avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"hs-subscription-service-worker.*", namespace="hspay", container!="POD", image!="", source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod)) * 100)

(avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod!~"hs-subscription-service-worker.*",pod!~"hs-subscription-service-read.*",pod=~"hs-subscription-service-.*", namespace="hspay", container!="POD", image!="", source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod)) * 100)

(avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod!~"hs-subscription-service-read-p0.*",pod=~"hs-subscription-service-read.*", namespace="hspay", container!="POD", image!="", source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod)) * 100)

(avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"hs-subscription-service-read-p0.*", namespace="hspay", container!="POD", image!="", source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod)) * 100)

(avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"order.*", namespace="hspay", container!="POD", image!="", source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{source_cluster="$source_cluster"}) by (pod)) * 100)
